Name: Underground Sheriff
About the game: Hey, Sheriff! It's time to make a law even where there is none. The underground world is going to be populated. But as long as danger and insecurity persist there, the world cannot do anything. You're going to manage on your own, because that's the only way you'll prove that you're a real sheriff who fights for his territory. As tradition, your mission on this funny action game will be to destroy the underground monsterswe. For this we have prepared a real revolver that will help you to exit from any situations! Put on the uniform right now and free the underground city from the bad guys. Game Features : - 55 levels - 5 types of weapons(Revolver,Machine Gun,Super Blaster) - Shop(Boost Speed,More Life,Shield)
